name: Kshitiz Agrawal
position: Lead Full Stack Developer | Junior Solution Architect | Java • Spring Boot • React • System Design • Microservices
about: I’m a Lead Full Stack Developer and Solution Architect with 6+ years of experience building scalable, secure, and user-centric platforms in the fintech space. I specialize in full-stack development using Java, Spring Boot, and React, with a strong focus on system design and microservices architecture. My work has spanned across building identity frameworks, secure device authorization systems, geolocation tracking for mobile platforms, and CRM integrations — all designed to improve performance, compliance, and user experience at scale. I thrive in cross-functional environments where technology meets business outcomes. Whether mentoring teams, collaborating with product managers, or delivering under pressure, I bring a deep sense of ownership, architectural thinking, and delivery accountability to every project.

experience.title: Business Head – Prepaid Cards & Digital Wallet
experience.description: Transcorp was principal agent of Western Union since 1997 and provide Money Exchange and Money Transfer services. It has been licensed by RBI as an Authorised Dealer Category II and in this business since 1994. Transcorp is also into tours and travel business through its wholly-owned subsidiary, Ritco Travels. Transcorp has a network with more than 40 own branches across the country and more than 8000 distribution network. In Aug’16, Transcorp was also accorded PPI license by RBI to issue & operate prepaid payment system in India.Roles & ResponsibilitiesAs head of business for this new line of business in Transcorp, responsible for creating the brand, setting up the business of prepaid cards & digital wallets. - Creation of framework for the prepaid business and product development.- Strategic alliances with Banks, Financial Institutions, NPCI for designing & finalizing the product - Technology/Product alliances with platform developers, payment processors, device manufacturers & aggregators. - Business Alliances with large merchants, merchant aggregators & POS companies. - Finalize and institutionalize process, policies and operative procedures. - Building the business plan and models for finalization in consultation with the board. - Hiring, developing and building the team and ensure consistent performance delivery. - Strategic planning and implementation for meeting the budgets.
experience.description_html:
Transcorp was principal agent of Western Union since 1997 and provide Money Exchange and Money Transfer services. It has been licensed by RBI as an Authorised Dealer Category II and in this business since 1994. Transcorp is also into tours and travel business through its wholly-owned subsidiary, Ritco Travels. Transcorp has a network with more than 40 own branches across the country and more than 8000 distribution network. In Aug’16, Transcorp was also accorded PPI license by RBI to issue & operate prepaid payment system in India.

Roles & Responsibilities
As head of business for this new line of business in Transcorp, responsible for creating the brand, setting up the business of prepaid cards & digital wallets.
- Creation of framework for the prepaid business and product development.
- Strategic alliances with Banks, Financial Institutions, NPCI for designing & finalizing the product
- Technology/Product alliances with platform developers, payment processors, device manufacturers & aggregators.
- Business Alliances with large merchants, merchant aggregators & POS companies.
- Finalize and institutionalize process, policies and operative procedures.
- Building the business plan and models for finalization in consultation with the board.
- Hiring, developing and building the team and ensure consistent performance delivery.
- Strategic planning and implementation for meeting the budgets.

experience.title: GM & Head - Merchant Acquisition & Alliances (MoboMoney)
experience.description: MoboMoney is a RBI-licensed prepaid wallet which uses NFC (Near Field Communication) technology to facilitate digital payments. It is the prepaid instrument in India which enables over the counter payments for goods and services, akin to a credit / debit card. MoboMoney also has an aggregation of services including VAS, Canteen & Parking solutions.Roles & Responsibilities•	Build the Merchant Business strategy and lead the execution including engagement models•	Ownership for Merchant Business Development, Retail Neighborhood Market Rollout.•	Conceptualizing, finalizing & managing banking/financial & strategic alliances•	Plan, monitor and manage execution of activities to enhance wallet transactions/activations•	Lead the overall product with improvement/establishment of key process. Participate in lead strategy, policy formulation and business case finalization•	Implement the strategic goals of the organization through day-to-day management of operations•	Ensure all Statutory & Regulatory Compliances in Operations (RBI & General Law of Land)
experience.description_html:
MoboMoney is a RBI-licensed prepaid wallet which uses NFC (Near Field Communication) technology to facilitate digital payments. It is the prepaid instrument in India which enables over the counter payments for goods and services, akin to a credit / debit card. MoboMoney also has an aggregation of services including VAS, Canteen & Parking solutions.

Roles & Responsibilities
• Build the Merchant Business strategy and lead the execution including engagement models
• Ownership for Merchant Business Development, Retail Neighborhood Market Rollout.
• Conceptualizing, finalizing & managing banking/financial & strategic alliances
• Plan, monitor and manage execution of activities to enhance wallet transactions/activations
• Lead the overall product with improvement/establishment of key process. Participate in lead strategy, policy formulation and business case finalization
• Implement the strategic goals of the organization through day-to-day management of operations
• Ensure all Statutory & Regulatory Compliances in Operations (RBI & General Law of Land)

experience.title: Regional Head (North & East) - Partnerships Acquisition & Retention
experience.description: Loylty Rewardz is India's Premier Loyalty & Rewards management company which offers bespoke services related to development and management of consumer loyalty, analytics, data intelligence and direct marketing communication. It has grown exponentially into one of the largest consumer relationship management and behavior analytics companies in IndiaRoles & Responsibilities•	Acquisition & Servicing of mid to large sized retail organizations into our multi-currency consumer commerce platform called Max Get More.•	Devise and deploy appropriate rewards and recognition mechanisms and use state-of-the-art tools, technology & data intelligence to influence consumer behavior in a way that is beneficial to the banks, our retail partners and most importantly, the consumers themselves•	Charting out marketing strategies and setting up distribution networks enhancing business volumes & growth and achieving revenue & profitability•	Providing Solution to Merchants to enhance their business with Loyalty Programs and CRM•	Monitoring partnership performance and gap analysis, conceptualization and execution of the communication strategy to address the specific requirements of the partners•	Alliances & account management of partner banks based in the region for card loyalty program
experience.description_html:
Loylty Rewardz is India's Premier Loyalty & Rewards management company which offers bespoke services related to development and management of consumer loyalty, analytics, data intelligence and direct marketing communication. It has grown exponentially into one of the largest consumer relationship management and behavior analytics companies in India

Roles & Responsibilities
• Acquisition & Servicing of mid to large sized retail organizations into our multi-currency consumer commerce platform called Max Get More.
• Devise and deploy appropriate rewards and recognition mechanisms and use state-of-the-art tools, technology & data intelligence to influence consumer behavior in a way that is beneficial to the banks, our retail partners and most importantly, the consumers themselves
• Charting out marketing strategies and setting up distribution networks enhancing business volumes & growth and achieving revenue & profitability
• Providing Solution to Merchants to enhance their business with Loyalty Programs and CRM
• Monitoring partnership performance and gap analysis, conceptualization and execution of the communication strategy to address the specific requirements of the partners
• Alliances & account management of partner banks based in the region for card loyalty program

experience.title: Zonal Head, Merchant Services
experience.description: Roles & Responsibilities•	Managing all Sales/BD functions & Service Operations of the zone •	Merchant Acquisition & Key Alliances, New product rollouts, National Merchants Management, Service delivery & managing regional merchant service call center•	Managing Outbound & Inbound Telecallers Team to resolve customer related issues with CRM•	Managing terminal Stock, Merchant Chargeback Operations and Retrieval for the zone•	Managing the budget & cost/profit responsibility of the zone
experience.description_html:
Roles & Responsibilities
• Managing all Sales/BD functions & Service Operations of the zone
• Merchant Acquisition & Key Alliances, New product rollouts, National Merchants Management, Service delivery & managing regional merchant service call center
• Managing Outbound & Inbound Telecallers Team to resolve customer related issues with CRM
• Managing terminal Stock, Merchant Chargeback Operations and Retrieval for the zone
• Managing the budget & cost/profit responsibility of the zone

experience.title: Regional Manager, Merchant Services
experience.description:     Sales & business development function for the entire state of Gujarat.  Coordinating & managing branch channel for sales, services, client negotiations & achieving the consolidated target for the entire region.   Resolving customer queries and complaints with preset turn around time limits & maintain high levels of service.
experience.description_html:
 Sales & business development function for the entire state of Gujarat.
 Coordinating & managing branch channel for sales, services, client negotiations & achieving the consolidated target for the entire region.
 Resolving customer queries and complaints with preset turn around time limits & maintain high levels of service.

experience.title: Regional Sales Manager, Merchant Services, North 2
experience.description:     Responsible for all sales and business development functions for the region.   Managed sales & after sales relationship for the region through a dedicated team of Area Managers & Sales Managers.   Responsible for effective training & development for the entire team and increase productivity.   Responsible as the Profit Center Head for the region.
experience.description_html:
 Responsible for all sales and business development functions for the region.
 Managed sales & after sales relationship for the region through a dedicated team of Area Managers & Sales Managers.
 Responsible for effective training & development for the entire team and increase productivity.
 Responsible as the Profit Center Head for the region.

experience.title: Branch Manager
experience.description:  Responsible for managing activities of Business development (issuing and acquiring), Recovery, Customer Satisfaction & In-house bookkeeping for the entire region under the Branch.  Managing the branch as an individual profit centre of the company.  Responsibilities also included coordinated working with various Bank of Baroda branches in the region.
